Subject: Progress of Joey Martinez

He has an ERA of 3.35, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Scott Carr
Dear Sir,

That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
